pages.text: This <modpack> adds more fertilizer and growth modifier options.

pages.title: Fertilizers
pages.text: The following <mark>IC2C</> fertilizers have been added:<li>Fertilizer<li2>1.75<li>Overgrowth Fertilizer<li2>2.75<li>Restoring Fertilizer<li2>3.50

pages.title: Growth Modifiers
pages.text: The following <mark>fluid</> fertilizers have been added:<li>Hot Spring Water<li2>2.0<li>Biomass<li2>1.50<li>Biocrude<li2>1.25
